name: Jumping Jacks
instructions: Stand with feet together and arms at your sides.
Jump up, spreading your feet wide and bringing your arms overhead.
Jump back to the starting position.

name: Arm Circles
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and arms extended to the sides.
Make small circles with your arms, gradually increasing the size.
Reverse the direction after 30 seconds.

name: High Knees
instructions: Stand tall with feet hip-width apart.
Run in place, bringing your knees up towards your chest as high as possible.
Pump your arms in rhythm with your legs.

name: Torso Twists
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and arms bent at the elbows.
Twist your torso from side to side, keeping your hips facing forward.
Look over your shoulder as you twist.

name: Leg Swings (Forward/Back)
instructions: Stand next to a wall for support.
Swing one leg forward and backward in a controlled motion.
Keep your torso upright and core engaged.

name: Leg Swings (Side-to-Side)
instructions: Stand facing a wall for support.
Swing one leg across your body and then out to the side.
Keep your hips square to the wall.

name: Bodyweight Squats
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart.
Lower your hips back and down as if sitting in a chair.
Keep your chest up and back straight.
Return to the starting position.

name: Lunges
instructions: Step forward with one leg and lower your hips until both knees are bent at a 90-degree angle.
Push back to the starting position.
Repeat with the other leg.

name: Butt Kicks
instructions: Run in place, kicking your heels up towards your glutes.
Keep your knees pointing down and torso upright.

name: Shoulder Rolls
instructions: Stand with arms at your sides.
Roll your shoulders up, back, and down in a circular motion.
Reverse the direction.

name: Neck Rotations
instructions: Slowly rotate your head in a circular motion.
Be gentle and avoid forcing any movement.
Reverse the direction.

name: Wrist Circles
instructions: Extend your arms in front of you.
Rotate your wrists in circular motions.
Reverse the direction.

name: Ankle Circles
instructions: Lift one foot off the ground.
Rotate your ankle in circular motions.
Reverse the direction and repeat with the other foot.

name: Hip Circles
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart and hands on your hips.
Rotate your hips in large circles.
Reverse the direction.

name: Cat-Cow Stretch
instructions: Start on your hands and knees.
Inhale and arch your back (Cow), looking up.
Exhale and round your spine (Cat), tucking your chin.
Repeat slowly.

name: Bird-Dog
instructions: Start on your hands and knees.
Extend your opposite arm and leg simultaneously.
Hold for a moment, then return to the starting position.
Repeat on the other side.

name: Plank Walkouts
instructions: Stand tall, then hinge at your hips to place hands on the floor.
Walk your hands out until you are in a plank position.
Walk your hands back to your feet and stand up.

name: Mountain Climbers
instructions: Start in a plank position.
Drive one knee towards your chest, then quickly switch legs.
Keep your core engaged and hips level.

name: Jump Rope
instructions: Hold a jump rope handles at your sides.
Swing the rope over your head and jump over it as it passes under your feet.
Keep a steady rhythm.

name: Band Pull-Aparts
instructions: Hold a resistance band with both hands in front of you.
Pull the band apart by squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Return to the starting position with control.

name: Wall Pushups
instructions: Stand facing a wall and place your hands on it at shoulder height.
Lower your chest towards the wall by bending your elbows.
Push back to the starting position.

name: Glute Bridges
instructions: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat on the floor.
Lift your hips towards the ceiling, squeezing your glutes.
Lower back down.

name: Side Lunges
instructions: Stand with feet wide apart.
Shift your weight to one side, bending that knee while keeping the other leg straight.
Push back to center and repeat on the other side.

name: Calf Raises
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart.
Rise up onto your toes, lifting your heels off the ground.
Lower back down.

name: Scapular Pushups
instructions: Start in a plank position.
Keep your arms straight and sink your chest towards the floor by squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Push your upper back towards the ceiling to separate your shoulder blades.
